field.name: summary
field.value: Remove NH Facility dependency on NHibernate.Mapping.Attribute.dll

field.name: description
field.value:
Commit r3812 (Applied patch from Brian Chan "NHibernate.Mapping.Attribute Support") has added two things to NH Facility:
1) The ability to declare entity mappings by decorating the classes with mappings attributes. 2) A dependency on the library "NHibernate.Mapping.Attribute.dll"...
Even if you don't use NH mapping attributes, the library "NHibernate.Mapping.Attribute.dll" must be present when using NH Facility.
This patch correct that. Instead of calling HbmSerializer (the tool that create mappings files using the attributes in an assembly) for each assembly defined in the NH facility configuration, we first test if the assembly has a dependency on "NHibernate.Mapping.Attribute". If it's the case, the necessary calls to "NHibernate.Mapping.Attribute" are done using reflexion.
